original_text: Then was kindled the wrath of Elihu the son of Barachel the Buzite, of the kindred of Ram: against Job was his wrath kindled, because he justified himself rather than God.
korean_text: 람 종족 부스 사람 바라겔의 아들 엘리후가 화를 내니 그가 욥에게 화를 냄은 욥이 하나님보다 자기가 의롭다 함이요

sentences.original_text: Then was kindled the wrath of Elihu
the son of Barachel the Buzite
against Job was his wrath kindled
because he justified himself rather than God
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그가 하나님보다 자신을 의롭다 하였음이라
